info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.
info.title: BillingManagementClient

get.description: Lists the transactions for an invoice. Transactions include purchases, refunds and Azure usage charges.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

azureCreditApplied.description: The amount of any Azure credits automatically applied to this transaction.

azurePlan.description: The type of azure plan of the subscription that was used for the transaction.

billingCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 code for the currency in which this transaction is billed.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile which will be billed for the transaction.

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile which will be billed for the transaction.

customerDisplayName.description: The name of the customer for which the transaction took place. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer for which the transaction took place. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing account.

discount.description: The percentage discount, if any, applied to this transaction.

effectivePrice.description: The price of the product after applying any discounts.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate used to convert charged amount to billing currency, if applicable.

invoice.description: Invoice on which the transaction was billed or 'pending' if the transaction is not billed.

invoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice on which the transaction was billed. This field is only applicable for transactions which are billed.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The name of the invoice section which will be billed for the transaction.

invoiceSectionId.description: The ID of the invoice section which will be billed for the transaction.

kind.description: The kind of transaction. Options are all or reservation.

marketPrice.description: The retail price of the product.

orderId.description: The order ID of the reservation. The field is only applicable for transaction of kind reservation.

orderName.description: The name of the reservation order. The field is only applicable for transactions of kind reservation.

pricingCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 code for the currency in which the product is priced.

productDescription.description: The description of the product for which the transaction took place.

productFamily.description: The family of the product for which the transaction took place.

productType.description: The type of the product for which the transaction took place.

productTypeId.description: The ID of the product type for which the transaction took place.

quantity.description: The quantity purchased in the transaction.

servicePeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the product term, or the end date of the month in which usage ended.

servicePeriodStartDate.description: The date of the purchase of the product, or the start date of the month in which usage started.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription that was used for the transaction. The field is only applicable for transaction of kind reservation.

subscriptionName.description: The name of the subscription that was used for the transaction. The field is only applicable for transaction of kind reservation.

subTotal.description: The pre-tax charged amount for the transaction.

tax.description: The tax amount applied to the transaction.

transactionAmount.description: The charge associated with the transaction.

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used to bill for the product. For example, compute services are billed per hour.

units.description: The number of units used for a given product.

unitType.description: The description for the unit of measure for a given product.
